DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to prove that HCP0910 is therapeutically equivalent to Seretide 250 Diskus when repeatedly dosed to Asthmatic patients.
DOC.brief_title: Therapeutic Equivalence Study of HCP0910 250/50 Mcg to Seretide 250 Diskus in Asthmatic Patients
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate, Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: age 20 ~ 75 inclusive Asthmatic diagnosis in more than 12 weeks from screening day Shows more than 12 % increase, and 200mL increase in FEV1 measure on Visit 2 Maintain controlled asthma for more than 4 weeks before screening Diagnosed as a severe asthmatic patients
